name: The Adversary and the Never-Dies Machine
name_original: The Adversary and the Never-Dies Machine
description:
The Divines Motion and Perennial engage in a years-long dance that can only end in death.

A lightly interactive short story. You can view it on desktop, tablet, or mobile.

For a plain text/screen reader friendly version, please visit this link!

Created for Secret Samol 2022, a Friends at the Table fanwork gift exchange :) Receiving a prompt about my own rarepair was a true gift.

The characters are from Friends at the Table’s Partizan season.
